definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
